channel.title: airport on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa
channel.description: Recent content in airport on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa

item.title: Shenzhen Airport
item.description: According to this website below you can get a visa on arrival (VOA) at the Shenzhen airport: http://www.gdcrj.com/zxdt/zxdt/201507/t20150730_31301.htmThere are some requirements according the airline visa database: `Passengers with a normal passport arriving at Chongqing (CKG), Guangzhou (CAN), Guilin (KWL), Haikou (HAK), Kunming (KMG), Qingdao (TAO), Sanya (SYX), Shenzhen (SZX), Weihai (WEH), Xi An (XIY) and Yantai (YNT) can obtain a visa on arrival if they have confirmation that a visa has been approved before departure and: that a visa will be issued on arrival; and passport contains at least 1 blank visa page for the sticker-type visa; and a sponsor (approved by Chinese authorities) meets passenger on arrival.
